text: The Men's 400 metre freestyle competition of the 2018 African Swimming Championships was held on 13 September 2018. ==Records== Prior to the competition, the existing world and championship records were as follows. {| class=wikitable style=text-align:center |- ! !! Name !! Nation !! Time !! Location !! Date |- |World record||align=left|Paul Biedermann||align=left|||align=left|3:40.07||Rome||26 July 2009 |- |African record||align=left|Oussama Mellouli||align=left|||align=left|3:41.11||Rome||26 July 2009 |- |Championship record||align=left|Jay-Cee Thomson||align=left|||align=left|3:53.12||Casablanca||16 September 2010 |} The following new records were set during this competition. {| class="wikitable" style=text-align:center |- ! Date !! Event !! Name !! Nationality !! Time !!
